channel.title: Pre-Formated Layout
channel.description:
With the permission of Taharok I am posting a Pre-Fomated Layout. This is to help everyone who wishes to make their topic look amazing for viewers to cheer you on your way of development! If you wish this, feel free to use this layout!
[center][size=36pt][b]Your server name[/b][/size]
[center]Base(s): [hr] Base [/hr][/center]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b]Your server logo[/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Section 3[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donations]Section 4[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#note]Credit/Section 7[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Your introduction, try to start off with something that will tell someone they should apply or they'll regret it. EX: Apply now or you'll miss all the fun!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] Talk about your group. Tell about your inspiration or something. EX: I was inspired to make a RSPS, and now here I am, making a server!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]3.0 - Section 3 (Suggested Topic Readers Want to Know After Reading Topic 2: Our Aim)[/b][/size] Expand your topic. EX: Our Aim is to bring PKing to its best!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]4.0 - Section 4 (Suggested Topic at This Point: Donations System, What Program We Will Use, or How Our Server Is Differant)[/b][/size] Expand your topic. EX: Half of our donation will go to charity, We will use dropbox and teamviewer, Our server provides stability, with no lag!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]5.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
(For appliance, I changed the colors.)
Entertainers:
[b]0 (Amount you have)b]
EX: Arham 4 (In-game Name)/Arham 4 (Our servers forum name (Optional)) - Arham 4 (Moparscape Forums Name Person 2
Coders:
[b]0[/b]
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7
Suggestors:
[b]0[/b]
Person 1 Person 2
Testers:
[b]0[/b]
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7 Person 8 [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]6.0 - Credits/Section 7[/b][/size]
[b]Contributor's name:[/b] Contribution [b]Contributor's name:[/b] Contribution [b]Contributor's name:[/b] Contribution
---
Expand Your Topic.
[code] [center][size=36pt][b]Your server name[/b][/size]
[center]Base(s): [hr] Base [/hr][/center]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b]Your server logo[/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Section 3[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donations]Section 4[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#note]Credit/Section 7[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Your introduction, try to start off with something that will tell someone they should apply or they'll regret it. EX: Apply now or you'll miss all the fun!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] Talk about your group. Tell about your inspiration or something. EX: I was inspired to make a RSPS, and now here I am, making a server!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]3.0 - Section 3 (Suggested Topic Readers Want to Know After Reading Topic 2: Our Aim)[/b][/size] Expand your topic. EX: Our Aim is to bring PKing to its best!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]4.0 - Section 4 (Suggested Topic at This Point: Donations System, What Program We Will Use, or How Our Server Is Differant)[/b][/size] Expand your topic. EX: Half of our donation will go to charity, We will use dropbox and teamviewer, Our server provides stability, with no lag!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]5.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
(For appliance, I changed the colors.)
Entertainers:
[b]0 (Amount you have)b]
EX: Arham 4 (In-game Name)/Arham 4 (Our servers forum name (Optional)) - Arham 4 (Moparscape Forums Name Person 2
Coders:
[b]0[/b]
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7
Suggestors:
[b]0[/b]
Person 1 Person 2
Testers:
[b]0[/b]
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7 Person 8 [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b]6.0 - Credits/Section 7[/b][/size]
[b]Contributor's name:[/b] Contribution [b]Contributor's name:[/b] Contribution [b]Contributor's name:[/b] Contribution
---
Expand Your Topic. [/code]
I hope your servers get successful and I don't want any credits for this layout, I just purely want to help all of you fellow Moparscapians. [size=36pt] More Layouts to come! [/size]

item.title: Pre-Formated Layout
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

With the permission of Taharok I am posting a Pre-Fomated Layout. This is to help everyone who wishes to make their topic look amazing for viewers to cheer you on your way of development! If you wish this, feel free to use this layout!

[center][size=36pt]Your server name[/size]

[center]Base(s):
[hr]
Base
[/hr][/center]

[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5]Your server logo[/size]

[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#aim]Section 3[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#donations]Section 4[/iurl][/li]

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
Your introduction, try to start off with something that will tell someone they should apply or they’ll regret it. EX: Apply now or you’ll miss all the fun!

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2]2.0 - About us[/size]
Talk about your group. Tell about your inspiration or something. EX: I was inspired to make a RSPS, and now here I am, making a server!

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2]3.0 - Section 3 (Suggested Topic Readers Want to Know After Reading Topic 2: Our Aim)[/size]
Expand your topic. EX: Our Aim is to bring PKing to its best!

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2]4.0 - Section 4 (Suggested Topic at This Point: Donations System, What Program We Will Use, or How Our Server Is Differant)[/size]
Expand your topic. EX: Half of our donation will go to charity, We will use dropbox and teamviewer, Our server provides stability, with no lag!

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]
